tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** ***** He listens to any problem with all ears and understands it very well. **** ************** open to even the silliest queries and  never exaggerates anything. For any problem, he starts with the cause of it, which helps to stay alert in future. He doesn't prescribe any medicines unless highly required, rather tries to solve first with natural ways. The best part about Dr Amitoj is his skills on vaccination. I have seen babies crying just for few seconds and the very next moment they are happy as if nothing happened. He pacifies and handles the kids like a pro. Dr. Amitoj is a man of work, not words. I would highly recommend for any pediatrics issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ****** *** **** ********* *** *********** very gentle and nice to talk with. Explains everything very well. Overall good experience consistently. He goes an extra mile by means of correcting staff's mistakes right there when it happens. Thus he does not stop with his primary duty but attempts for overall improvements in the hospital he work for.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor listened all the history of the kid and examined my son thoroughly. I had feared due to high grade fever which my son had. But doctor calmly explained about his observations and gave the confidence. He is right. My son is doing well after 3 days of medication as he told. Not prescribed any unnecessary test or antibiotics. Thank you doctor. I will surely recommend him..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: ******** ********* Extremely rude and unapproachable. Wasn't willing to listen to any concerns. As new parents, we felt uncomfortable to approach him with any questions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor did not rush and answered all my questions with lot of patience. This is the second time we visited Dr.  Amitoj, he is a very good pediatrician. He will not prescribe unnecessary medicines with strong dosage. I recommended him to my friends as well.

The doctor is arrogant and explains things vaguely. Was such a blow up of time and money.
If you ask a genuine doubt , he talks about life skills and parenting skills. 
Do yourself a favour by finding another doctor.
